body.p: Which of the following would not be associated with formation of the Nodes of Ranvier?

feedback.p: Incorrect. In the peripheral nervous system they would be found on either side forming the intermodal region.
Correct. Neither the soma nor synapses would be myelinated.
Incorrect. This is the structure being surrounded by one of the myelinating glial cells and exposed to extracellular fluid only at the Node of Ranvier.
Incorrect. In the central nervous system they would be found on either side forming the intermodal region.

hint.p: This would be found in both central and peripheral nervous system.
